extracted_playbook.title: Contact VIMESA for Additional Information
extracted_playbook.description: Reach out to VIMESA for more details on mitigating the vulnerabilities in their products.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all control system devices and/or systems are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control Systems Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Place control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment before deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, as detailed on the ICS webpage at cisa.gov/ics.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
